attributes.action: stop the 2.35 pence raise in petrol tax per litre sold in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This tax hike comes into force at the start of the week commencing 1st October , just as oil prices are at record highs and every motorist is already being punished!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
